com.google.appinventor.shared.rpc.project

Interface ProjectService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RemoteService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProjectServiceImpl

    @RemoteServiceRelativePath(value="projects")
public interface ProjectService
extends RemoteService
    Interface for the service providing project information.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • newProject

        UserProject newProject(String projectType,
                     String projectName,
                     NewProjectParameters params)
        Creates a new project.
        Parameters:
        projectType - type of new project
        projectName - name of new project
        params - optional parameters (project type dependent)
        Returns:
        a UserProject for new project

                      String newName)
        Copies a project with a new name.
        Parameters:
        oldProjectId - old project ID
        newName - new name of project
        Returns:
        a UserProject for new project

      • deleteFile

        long deleteFile(long projectId,
              String fileId)
        Deletes a file in the given project.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        fileId - ID of file to delete
        Returns:
        modification date for project

      • deleteFiles

        long deleteFiles(long projectId,
               String directory)
        Deletes all files that are contained directly in the given directory. Files in subdirectories are not deleted.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        directory - path of the directory
        Returns:
        modification date for project

      • load

        String load(long projectId,
          String fileId)
        Loads the file information associated with a node in the project tree. The actual return value depends on the file kind. Source (text) files should typically return their contents. Image files will be more likely to return the URL that the browser can find them at.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        fileId - project node whose source should be loaded
        Returns:
        implementation dependent

      • loadraw

        byte[] loadraw(long projectId,
             String fileId)
        Loads the file information associated with a node in the project tree. The actual return value is the raw file contents.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        fileId - project node whose source should be loaded
        Returns:
        raw file content

      • loadraw2

        String loadraw2(long projectId,
              String fileId)
        Loads the file information associated with a node in the project tree. The actual return value is the raw file contents encoded as base64.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        fileId - project node whose source should be loaded
        Returns:
        raw file content as base64

      • load

        List<FileDescriptorWithContent> load(List<FileDescriptor> files)
        Loads the contents of multiple files.
        Parameters:
        files - list containing file descriptor of files to be loaded
        Returns:
        list containing file descriptors and their associated content

      • save

        long save(long projectId,
        String fileId,
        String content)
        Saves the content of the file associated with a node in the project tree.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        fileId - project node whose source should be saved
        content - content to be saved
        Returns:
        modification date for project
        See Also:
        load(long, String)

      • save

        long save(List<FileDescriptorWithContent> filesAndContent)
        Saves the contents of multiple files.
        Parameters:
        filesAndContent - list containing file descriptor and their associated content
        Returns:
        modification date for last modified project of list

      • build

        RpcResult build(long projectId,
              String nonce,
              String target)
        Invokes a build command for the project on the back-end.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        nonce - used to access the built project -- random string
        target - build target (optional, implementation dependent)
        Returns:
        results of invoking the build command

      • getBuildResult

        RpcResult getBuildResult(long projectId,
                       String target)
        Gets the result of a build command for the project from the back-end.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project ID
        target - build target (optional, implementation dependent)
        Returns:
        results of build. The following values may be in RpcResult.result: 0: Build is done and was successful 1: Build is done and was unsuccessful -1: Build is not yet done.

      • addFile

        long addFile(long projectId,
           String fileId)
        Adds a new file to the given project.
        Parameters:
        projectId - project id
        fileId - id of file to add
        Returns:
        modification date for project
